text: Python or C/C++/C#, what should I learn?
I am a novice PHP/HTML/CSS "programmer" and am interested in learning a major language.
I looked up Python, and it seems to be pretty straightforward to use for someone coming off a language such as PHP.
At the same time, I've been searching around for examples of what I can build with Python and can't find any meaningful (popular) applications of it.
I really only have time to learn one language, and I am looking for one that will help me in mainstream programming, ie., programs, server code, web apps, etc.
